text: Louis Laurent Saha (born 8 August 1978) is a French former professional footballer who played as a striker. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup League cup Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Metz 1997–98 Division 1 21 1 2 0 0 0 3 0 — 26 1 1998–99 Division 1 3 0 0 0 0 0 3 0 — 6 0 1999–2000 Division 1 23 4 3 0 1 0 8 8 — 35 12 Total 47 5 5 0 1 0 14 8 0 0 67 13 Newcastle United (loan) 1998–99 Premier League 11 1 1 1 0 0 0 0 — 12 2 Fulham 2000–01 First Division 43 27 1 0 4 5 — — 48 32 2001–02 Premier League 36 8 6 0 2 1 — — 44 9 2002–03 Premier League 17 5 3 1 0 0 8 1 — 28 7 2003–04 Premier League 21 13 1 2 0 0 — — 22 15 Total 117 53 11 3 6 6 8 1 0 0 142 63 Manchester United 2003–04 Premier League 12 7 0 0 0 0 2 0 0 0 14 7 2004–05 Premier League 14 1 2 0 4 1 2 0 — 22 2 2005–06 Premier League 19 7 4 2 5 6 2 0 — 30 15 2006–07 Premier League 24 8 2 1 0 0 8 4 — 34 13 2007–08 Premier League 17 5 2 0 0 0 5 0 0 0 24 5 Total 86 28 10 3 9 7 19 4 0 0 124 42 Everton 2008–09 Premier League 24 6 3 2 1 0 1 0 — 29 8 2009–10 Premier League 33 13 1 0 1 0 5 2 — 40 15 2010–11 Premier League 22 7 3 2 1 1 — — 26 10 2011–12 Premier League 18 1 0 0 2 1 — — 20 2 Total 97 27 7 4 5 2 6 2 0 0 115 35 Sunderland 2012–13 Premier League 11 0 0 0 3 0 — — 14 0 Lazio 2012–13 Serie A 6 0 0 0 — 0 0 — 6 0 Career total 385 117 36 12 24 15 47 15 0 0 492 159 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals France 2004 8 2 2005 0 0 2006 10 2 2007 0 0 2008 0 0 2009 0 0 2010 0 0 2011 1 0 2012 1 0 Total 20 4 :Scores and results list France's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Saha goal.
